column4: Can anyone point me to a URL for the alternate installer boot files?  (don't need the whole CD)
what do you mean by alternate installer boot files?
but for the alternate CD, not the network installer
Well, I didn't understand a thing. You are looking for jsut the kernel and InitRd? No idea :(
I generally don't pull down the whole CD.  It's usually easer just to pull the boot files to an existing linux box, boot to them then do a clean install
